Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: William_Helgason
Reviews.Content: hotel located staff friendly helpful hotel worth 180 night paid decor dated bit shabby building size 3 bed people lacked furniture dated decor bit shabby tv tube english channel bbc news wifi free constantly dropping connections breakfast below average recommend hotel merits 4 stars pricetag

Reviews.Title: “hotel too old and dirty”
Reviews.Author: Brennan17
Reviews.Content: location inside pocket jacket 250 gone hotel oldthe rudeness waitress water bottle 4 stars rome ago remained memories time disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, good value for money, staff speak english”
Reviews.Author: kikka1
Reviews.Content: holiday purely cultural hotel situation heart rome spanish steps piazza barberini excellent location barberini metro 2 minutes walk 2 3 tavola street convenient comfortable spacious bathrooms clean amenities included tv telephone mini bar staff spoke english polite friendly breakfast abundant week christmas rates paid value money recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Horrible, the heating doesn't work, nasty smell in the lobby, impolite receptionist”
Reviews.Author: Lexxisz
Reviews.Content: hotel 2 weeks ago week floor hotel 4th floor couldnt natural light dust bathroom heating frosty doors shower cabin couldnt closed properly impossible sleep horrible conditions day change third floor heating 2 nights 6 outside cold 68 celsius degrees night liked rainy night started rain oozed water ceiling 4th floor terrace hotel liked breakfast hotel diversified especially cakes delicious location hotel city center 2 minutes underground bus station

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is old, tired and smelly and badly needs refurbishing.”
Reviews.Author: LouiseandSam
Reviews.Content: stayed couple times requested breakfast poor coffee worst italy world believe espresso machine stew vile brew kitchen

HotelInfo.Name: Leonardi Sistina Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Sistina 136 | Piazza di Spagna, 00187 Rome, Italy
